descriptionHtml:
[color=\"#8B0000\"][size=\"5\"][b]Nidias Face by Nightshade[/b][/size][/color]

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#8B0000\"][b]Description:[/b][/color][/size]

Hey, guys. 
This is my first upload and I can\'t speak English very well. For that reason I\'ll keep this simple.
This mod changes the human female face and eye textures (hair not includet). 

I recommend to use this with:
[list]
[*][url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666\"]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition - CBBE - by Caliente[/url]
[*][url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7127\"]RANs HeadMesh Variants by RAN46[/url] (\'Type A\' has been used for the screenshots)
[/list]
Thank you for reading!

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#8B0000\"][b]How to install:[/b][/color][/size]

Simply extract the included files into your \'data\' directory.

========================================================================================

Description by kanoba84
author: Nightshade
